law.catch_line: Effect of federal Soybean Act on assessments levied under KRS 247.510 to 247.595.

text.section: Notwithstanding KRS 247.510 to 247.595, no assessment levied under KRS 247.510 to 247.595 shall be effective as long as the federal Soybean Promotion, Research, and Consumer Information Act, 7 U.S.C. secs. 6301 to 6311, is in effect.

If the federal act is terminated or suspended, any assessment levied under KRS 247.510 to 247.595 shall become effective and shall be collected and utilized according to the provisions of KRS 247.510 to 247.595.

law.history: Created 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 88, sec. 1, effective July 12, 2006.
